case.state: Hell yeah! I’m Saki Nikaidou! I used to ride with Dorami, but now I’m the leader of Saga’s number one idol group Franchouchou!
Listen up punks! I’m Saki Nikaidou. You probably know me better as Number Two, the leader of Saga’s one and only zombie idol group, Franchouchou!
OI! I’m the legendary Legendary Biker Squad Leader Saki Nikaidou! Though I died riding, I was brought back as a kickass zombie!
Hell yeah! It’s Saki Nikaidou and her girl Sakura the Egghead, the sexiest pair of traffic accidents turned zombies you ever seen!
However, we’re not idols from the Saga’s number one group, Franchouchou, so it’s all right for us to play sexy games! Wait, Egghead, weren’t there somethin’ else I wasn’t s’posed to admit?
Ah shit, wait. I wasn’t supposed to mention the Franchouchou stuff here, or that I’m a zombie. Pretend you didn’t hear that.
I mean, uh, I have no idea what Franchouchou is. Idols aren’t s’posed to play strip poker and shit.
Most importantly, I have no relationship to the gorgeous Number Two of Saga’s own Franchouchou idol group! Also I’m not a zombie!
Let’s see ~cards~ cards, man!
~cards~ cards, dealer!
~cards~!
Let’s see ~cards~ cards!

Slap me with ~cards~!
What would Shades do? ~cards~ CARDS!!
~cards~ cards or else, dealer.
~cards~ feel like a good amount.
Eh, I’m probably good anyway. Here’s ~cards~ cards.
How many is this? This many cards.
Ugh, gotta decide. ~cards~? No wait! Aw, too late.
~cards~.
I’m just here to scope some dick n’ puss. Here’s some cards.
Gonna throw this shit out. ~cards~ cards.
~cards~ card. Gimme good ones this time!
I don’t need any cards! No wait, I need ~cards~!
AHAHAHA! ~cards~!
Anyone else here not even pay attention to this part? Anyway, 6 cards.
SIR, YES SIR!
Read ‘em and weep!
Don’t underestimate me just ‘cause I’m an idol! I’m more than a pretty face.
Ha! This’ll be a piece of cake!
Oooh, I get ta see someone else striptease this round!
When I go in, I go all in.
So, the rest of ya prepared to bare it all?
Well, well, well. You nerds ready to lose?
Betcha can’t tell what kinda hand I got!
Get outta the way or get run over!
Looks like I can sit back, relax, and enjoy the strippin’.
SHIT YEAH THAT’S WHAT I’M TALKING ABOUT!
Screw with me and you’ll regret it. I’m the number one biker queen in all of Saga, got it?
Winnin’ cards and strippin’ hotties. That’s what bein’ an idol’s all about!
Sunday morning rain is falling….
Coulda done better. It’s the deck’s fault, though.
Winnin’ this hand is a matter of guts!
This hand ain’t exciting. It’s just… there.
So is there a way to up my bet? I wanna raise.
Hell yeah! Blackjack!
I ain’t trust these cards, but let’s see what happens.
Man I dunno. These’re cards. That’s all I can figure.
Think I pulled this one off.
I brought my hand back from the dead!
You sure we can’t do strip motorbike stunts instead?
Now that I think about it, I ain’t even die in these clothes. I mean yeah, not much of my outfit probably left after I blew the fuck up, but where’d Shades get these threads?
No one can beat me in a race! Sucks this ain’t a race though.
Ya know, ~player~, if your hand’s got you down, I recommend checking out the Franchouchou concert later. Those cute gals’ll pep you right up!
Luck be a lady toniiiiiiight!
Ain’t no necromancy bringing this hand back to life.
This gotta be rigged! No way I suck this bad!
I wonder if Tae would eat these cards for me?
This hand’s deader than my Tamagotchi.
Hey Dealer, you wanna die?
I don’t get it. How do I get good cards?
These cards are dead to me!
Aw, sunuva bitch! I shoulda kept that!
Shit, I fucked up!
Eh, whatever. This is a nerd game anyway.
What am I doin’ wrong?
I’m a speed demon, not a card shark. Just not my game.
YEEEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAAoh wait, that’s not good.
Gotta stay calm. Be like Big Sis Yuugiri. She don’t never lose her head. Well, maybe one time.
Ummmmmm… I don’t get it.
Hell yeah, time to show off my bluffin’ skills! This hand… does not suck shit.
It’s a good thing I’m definitely not an idol, so I can say out loud this hand is turds from a dumpster’s butthole.
Clive Sollish? How the hell you spell that shit?
This beep-boop thing’s talking to me! Why’re you green, Micro-Softie? You a zombie computer?
Oi, Javascript. You should play Adabana Necromancy by Franchouchou. They’re this great up and coming idol group. You should come to our shows! I mean their shows.
Woah, Greenie there’s your WIFE? She got big tits, nice.
Maybe if ya got too many thoughts in ya brain, Egghead. But you know me. One minute I was “Dang, girl’s cute,” next it was “Guess I’m gonna have to smooch all’a them!”
Course I looked cool! Never smoked much ‘cept rubber, but I loved gettin’ the Asahi Super Dry at Drive-In Tori! Uh, I was sober when I crashed my bike, though.
Egghead, oughta we invite Ai next time? She’s always so serious, we gotta get her laid! Though I dunno what people’ll think when the bandages come off.
Okay Egghead, what if… it was Shades drivin’ the truck! N’ Shades piloted Junko’s plane too! And was driving the motorcycle I drove offa cliff?
Remember Egghead, if Shades asks, we were just flyerin’ the joint for the Franchouchou concert. No slippin’ about the strippin’!
Hey Egghead, what kinda gals you like? Besides blonde biker bombshells, of course.
Egghead, mind if I ask you what kinda guys you like scramblin’ your eggs?

Listen Egghead, don’t tell Shades ‘bout none of this. Part ‘cause he’d be mad, and part ‘cause he might wanna do it himself. I don’t need to see Shades usual obnoxious-ass self but his dick floppin’ around also.
Please don’t tell Shrimpy ‘bout none a’ this, Egghead. She's too pure for this sinful world. N’ Shades brought ‘er back anyway.

Oi Egghead, ya ever wonder what Shades is like under his shades? I bet he’s actually cryin’ all the time! Ya know, ‘cause he’s afraid of me.

Egghead, ya think Big Sis Yuugiri’d like this place? This seems like her joint. ‘Course knowin’ her, she’d clean house in more ways than one.
~Player~, feel free to call Sakura “Egghead” instead. I named her that ‘cause her head looks like an egg. Also she’s a nerd.
Yeah, she a zombie, ~player~. But opportunities to roll in the hay with celebrity idols don’t come every day, let’s not let this opportunity slip by.
Hell yeah she a zombie, ~player~! A fine-ass sex machine of a zombie! An’ you might get summa that tonight!
In the interest of full disclosure, ~player~, Egghead here’s what you’d call a zombie. She’s also what you’d call a hot piece of ass, so let’s get her hot n’ wet in preparation for tonight!
Hey Egghead, can you believe those goons at the door carded you? ‘Course you’re 18 years old! Just not all inna row.
Hell yeah it feels good! The wind on your face! The roar of the engine! The— oh, you mean on my pussy. Nah, it don’t vibrate enough for that, which is why I had Reiko finger me.
Niiiiice catch, ~player~. Go ahead n’ keep that as a, whaddya call it. A memento. A memento mori.

No Piggy, ain’t none of us like bein’ ass-fucked by you n’ ya fascist thugs!
She’s a zombie, yeah. But the hottest zombie idol you ever gonna meet! Too bad you done already, ~player~, you coulda gotten with this.
Yo, I asked the dudes if they had any Street Fighter here, and they put me at this table. What gives?
Yeah, I’m a zombie, Phones. You got a problem with that?
Sorry Egghead, but “Number Two”’s gotta look out for number one!
Forget it Piggy, I ain’t snitchin’ on no one and that includes myself. More importantly, my ID burned to a crisp after a little bike accident I had.
Hell yeah! Nothin’ compares to the feel of you and the open air, speedin’ along!
I think my sex life can safely be described as “dead,” Streams.
Eh, a little bit. A couple’a pieces hadda be put back together, but Junko had it way worse’n me.
My ol’ flame Reiko wanted to settle down, have a normal family. But what even is normal, ya know?
I know, I am a babe.
You got good eyes, Streams. I am a badass. But I’m “retired” from that life.
I’m great, an’ you go out n’ beat me anyway. That takes some guts.
I’m great, an’ you go out n’ beat me anyway. That takes some guts.
Geez guys. I know I’m good, but come on. I ain’t into walloping weaklings.
All right! First thing, first thing… Guess my shoes’ll do.
I’m first? Eh, whatever. I’ll just take off something lame like my shoes.
Mondo? Sorry buddy, don’t ring a bell. I been… outta the biker life for a while now, so I ain’t been keeping tabs on everybody.
What’s with that ’tude, Javascript? I don’t wanna show no goods right outta the gate is all.
Friggin’… Shades would say it was him, but I don’t belong to no one!
Aw, I guess I shoulda figured my warrants preceded me.
Used ta just think I didn’t wanna go out like a punk. Now I know it’s even worse to go out like a fuckin’ dumbass.
I don’t pretend to get it, but Reiko seems happy. That’s what really matters. I got my own family with my girls in Franchouchou!

Eh? Nah. It doesn’t matter if they’re dead or we’re dead or Saga’s fulla old people. We’re gonna take over the whole damn country!

Can’t wait to see all a’ ~name~!

Can’t believe ~name~ was the one to whup me n’ ~player~. Speakin’ of, ~player~, after the show, ya wanna— aw nevermind, you’re spent for today.
I feel like I could go another round. Too bad ~player~ looks tapped out. Ah well, wanna find a back room, just the two of us, Egghead?
Wow, ~player~’s spent. Too bad too, I coulda gone another round. Well, let’s find a love hotel for us two, Egghead.
I could go another round, and from the looks of things, so could you Egghead. ~Player~? Naw, you down for the count. Oh well, looks we’re singin’ by ourselves tonight.
You did a damn good job whuppin’ our asses, ~player~. Too bad you didn’t get off, horny as you look! Maybe after the concert I can help with that! …Um, are those nerds even paying attention to us?
Goodbye, ~player~, goodbye, Jane. Will we ever meet again? Feel no sorrow, feel no shame. Come tomorrow, feel no pain.
We all got to get off, ‘cept for poor ~player~ here. Boy, you look really stuffed up there. Might be a two gal job. Whaddya say, Egghead?

“Damn, I though I was top bitch around here. Even if you look like a nerd, ya know your way around a deck a’ cards. Too bad outta all of us, you’re the one with some clearly “unmet needs.” Say, why not stay for the Franchouchou concert? It starts in a bit n’ I know a coupla people than can getcha backstage passes!”

Heh, thought you was a nerd at the beginnin’, ~player~. Shows me, ya whupped us all! Course, seein’ ya flyin’ at full mast tells me yer victory was wantin’. Well, why don’tcha stay for the Franchouchou concert? It starts in a bit n’ I know a coupla people than can getcha backstage passes!
Hey, Mister Ladykiller! Kira! You and your pink cat robot friend oughta party with Franchouchou later. You can hang with ~player~ for now!
Damn, Egghead, think I’d learn to not underestimate you by now. I’m proud a’ you. By the by, if lookin’ at me jill made you horny, I’m here to help out!

Ya beat us off to not hafta beat off, ~name~! Good showin’. Now if you can hide your erection, Franchouchou got a show comin’ up. I’d invite you, ~player~, but ya look flattened out. Maybe another time?

epilogue.hint: Defeat both Saki and Sakura in a game.
epilogue.title: Trio

scene.name: UNDER CONSTRUCTION
scene.directive: You’ve unlocked the Saki and Sakura Dual epilogue. Wonderful!
Unfortunately, it is not done yet!
However, this placeholder was created, in order to bugtest the real ending’s unlock conditions.
If you reached this ending without having won a game against both Saki Nikaidou and Sakura Minamoto, do let Mister Solitaire know, won’t you?
Or, if you beat the two Franchouchou idols, but didn’t unlock this ending, please send in a bug report, or post a message on the Discord server.
Though, I suppose there’s no way you’d know to do that if you didn’t get this ending. Hm.
Ah, I suppose you’re disappointed because you didn’t get the ending you so passionately sought and worked for?
Well, worry not. Feel free to imagine all sorts of lurid goings-on between you and your putrid corpse wives!
Wonderful! Your creativity knows no bounds!
Okay, getting a little gross now. Let’s dial it back a bit, shall we?
Ahem. In any case, thank your for your patronage of Saki Nikaidou. Hopefully the final product is as magnificent as anything you could imagine.
It’ll be far greater than that, but I shan't say that aloud.
